_sText:
Http://s186.photobucket.com/albums/x131/svbg869/surf_annoyance/
^ more pictures ^
this map has been in production since early February 08.
I have had a total of 4 beta tests to get rid of all bugs, and im positive there all gone.
The name in the pictures is _B4 i know but i have changed the .bsp's name to just surf_annoyance.

About the map:
there is a 5 min. timer, that after 5 min choses one of 4 jails randomly for all people to play.
after beating the map the timer is stopped and the person who beat the map can choose one of 3 jails (2 of witch are available from no one beating the map).
there are a total of 8 surf areas:
1.1, 1.2, 1.3, 2.1, 2.2, 2.3, 3.1, 3.2
the different first # signifies a different texture set.

The jails:

Knife Fight- 
two people (one from each team) go into the knife fight area, and get a knife.
after one person dies, that persons, teams door opens, letting someone else challenge the winner of the previous fight.
this jail can only be gotten to by no one beating the map.

Dodge Jail-
bars come along the floor, increasing in number, for the players to dodge.
if a player fails to dodge or avoid a bar then they are killed.
this jail can only be gotten to by no one beating the map.

Para vs knife-
everyone spawns and gets a knife.
there is a para with allot of ammo in the middle of the room.
this jail can be gotten to both ways (someone beating the map, or no one)  
if chosen by someone who beat the map, they spawn on the para.

Gun Game-
a gun game style jail, two sides (T and CT).
players get better weapons depending on where they were in the map.
there is a hole in the middle of this jail, don't fall in you will die
this jail can be gotten to both ways (someone beating the map, or no one)  
if chosen by someone who beat the map, they get what people in the last level would get.

Kill-
can only be gotten to by someone beating the map.
the winner controls a small vehicle, and smashes into people with it, killing them.

this is a skill surf map, with areas ranging from easy to expert.
this map has been beaten in the beta tests so don't think its impossible.

i have spent a lot of time on this map, i am vary proud of it.
Solid Surf thread: http://forums.solidsurf.info/index.php/topic,1221.0.html

i have remade the map twice, so the fist page docent have any pictures from the current map, it has some pictures but the current map has lights.

i hope you enjoy my map.
